newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE cocoa pares losses, coffee hods gains in PM.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE cocoa pares losses, coffee hods gains in PM.

text.p: COCOA - Cuts losses, but traders still look for more downside. New fund sales said to have emerged after Tues' drop. At 1415 GMT, July down 1 at 1,000.
COFFEE - Extends gains after NY hits contract high on commission house buying. July up $17 at $1,615.
SUGAR - First three months soft, others steady. Aug leads volume. Aug off 0.2 at 312.0.
